column5: My grandson (age10) and I are looking for a fly-in to do some walleye fishing in later July or early August. Need some help in finding a nice place. Thanks, Kaz

Please be more specific as to what you are looking for and we can help. What area of canada? American plan lodge or outpost? do you want numbers of fish or trophy? Do you like to fish for anything else other than walleyes? Etc....... let us know and we can help. good luck I think it's great that you spend that time with your grandson.

If your looking at crossing the border at Fort Frances there is a good company located just out side of it called Rusty Myers Flying service. They have outposts on may lakes. I would suggest if you can go to a sport show where you can talk to people in person.>Please be more specific as to what you are looking for and >we can help. What area of canada? American plan lodge or >outpost? do you want numbers of fish or trophy? Do you >like to fish for anything else other than walleyes? >Etc....... let us know and we can help. good luck I think >it's great that you spend that time with your grandson.
